about.title: A Unique and Personalized Experience
about.subtitle: Dive from the charming village of Las Galeras, a peaceful haven at the end of the world
about.feature1Text: We are a human-sized center that emphasizes personalized and warm service. Groups of maximum 6 divers for optimal safety, always supervised by our PADI certified instructors.
about.feature2Text: Benefit from our expertise and perfect knowledge of the most beautiful sites in the region. Dive sites are chosen according to divers' skill levels and weather and maritime conditions.
about.feature3Text: The coral is always alive and above all extraordinarily beautiful! Coral gardens, coral labyrinths, caves, drop-offs, wrecks and the famous Piedra Bonita spot at Cabo Cabrón. Discover turtles, rays, giant barracudas and many other wonders.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: A complete range of services for all levels, from discovery dives to exploration dives

baptism.title: Discovery Dive
baptism.subtitle: From 8 years old
baptism.description: The Adventure Begins Here! Do you dream of exploring a new world? Give yourself your first breath underwater! Safety and Confidence: First gentle and supervised immersion in the pool to familiarize yourself with the equipment if needed.

training.title: PADI Training
training.subtitle: From beginner to expert
training.description: Get your PADI certification with our experienced instructors. From Scuba Diver to Advanced Open Water, we support you in your progression.

funDive.title: Fun Dives
funDive.subtitle: For certified divers
funDive.description: Explore the most beautiful sites of Las Galeras with our day dives. Single or double dive, discover coral gardens, caves, drop-offs and the famous Piedra Bonita.

nightDive.title: Night Dive
nightDive.subtitle: A magical experience
nightDive.description: Discover the magic of nocturnal marine life. A unique experience to observe creatures that only come out at night.

services.ctaTitle: Scuba diving in Las Galeras is a treat!
services.ctaText: You can also encounter turtles, rays, giant barracudas, and many other representatives of the local aquatic fauna.
